description: Aimed at beginners and intermediate developers, this course covers the creation of cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and the Dart programming language
This course teaches full-stack development using Node.js for the backend and React for the frontend. It covers server-side programming, RESTful API development
This course teaches the basics of game development using the Unity engine, covering game design principles, scripting in C#, physics, animation, and AI.
This course provides an introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms, using Python libraries such as scikit-learn, pandas, and TensorFlow.

topic: DevOps Essentials with Docker and Kubernetes
description: This practical course covers the essentials of DevOps practices, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes.

topic: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java
description: Essential for aspiring software engineers, this course dives into common data structures (like arrays, linked lists, and trees) and algorithms

topic: Front-End Wizardry: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
description: Dive into front-end development by learning the building blocks of the web. Create beautiful, responsive websites and learn how to manipulate web elements using JavaScript.

topic: Introduction to Cloud Computing with Microsoft Azure
description: Learn the basics of cloud services with Microsoft Azure. This course covers cloud storage, virtual machines, web services, and Azure's Cognitive Services.
Discover the power of Go (Golang), a language designed for building scalable and efficient software.
Learn the C# language and the .NET framework to build scalable, high-performance enterprise applications.
